comments.body: Hi @gondelare you the owner of Sensimall?  May I ask where did you OEM your CBD device ? hope we can cop for this !

comments.body: Quote from: gondel on August 07, 2022, 10:43:22 PMJust a quick post about a store accepting BTC.~Snipped~You will get 5% discount if you pay with crypto,Did a quick test and it seems you forgot to turn this feature on from the back-end [at the moment, there's only one option]!- I also noticed the checkout page doesn't show any kind of error for typing invalid stuff!
